messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: enjoy some motovational music to start your shift off

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Due to your captain being a shadowperson, I command for all of you to break or turn off all lights

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: NO LIGHTS OR IM SETTING YE TO ARREST

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Destroy glowshrooms and arrest botanist George

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Ion storm detected near the station. Please check all AI-controlled equipment for errors.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to space being cold, not more than 15 wire eating mammals have swarmed into the place with all those juicy wires.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Attention, an unmanned nanotrasen vessel has docked with your station.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Attention everyone, I am now your acting captain as of orders from Sir Kemble himself.
